subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Orioles pitcher Eric Bédard, who leads the majors in strikeouts with 199 and has a 3.11 earned run average, is finding it harder to maintain his anonymity.
snippet: Orioles pitcher Eric Bédard, who leads the majors in strikeouts with 199 and has a 3.11 earned run average, is finding it harder to maintain his anonymity.
